local_intent: Safely lift the already-grasped pot lid by 0.05 m and verify grasp stability before and after.
assumptions: Pot lid is already grasped and in the gripper
Sufficient vertical clearance exists to raise 0.05 m
coherence_with_global: Matches the GLOBAL_BT step following GraspAtPose on pot_lid by raising it prior to placement on the table.
